DataElement.preferredName: Person Neoadjuvant Therapy Receive And Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded response for questions to determine patient eligibility for clinical trial participation that address the administration and completion of therapeutic agents as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Neoadjuvant Therapy Receive And Complete Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._The administration of therapeutic agents prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective._To take, accept, or get something offered._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:The administration of therapeutic agents prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment for effective.

Concepts.definition: Therapy administered prior to the primary treatment for the purpose of making the primary treatment more effective.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received 8 cycles
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received 8 cycles of neoadjuvant mFOLFOX and completed this therapy at least 3 weeks (and no more than 6 weeks) prior to enrollment on this study?
